title: Filter mode wire frame
description: Shows all elements that comply with the filter block of a filter in a building scene layer.  The elements are drawn with an edge line.

type.description: Declares filter mode of type wire frame.

edges.description: An object defining solid edges of a feature. [See more](https://developers.arcgis.com/web-scene-specification/objects/edges/) information on supported edges in ArcGIS clients.
